DryadDataFile.dcterms:title: Sampling Data
DryadDataFile.dcterms:description: Sampling data for cores taken to assess intertidal invertebrate composition at seven sites along the Northern Gulf of Mexico coast. For each group of samples the date of collection, location, time, size and material of the corer used, lattitude, longitude and general weather conditions are recorded.
DryadDataFile.dcterms:subject: Coastal Ecology
Community composition
animal-sediment relationships
habitat
Estuary
